english_example_sentence: If you crossed that old bridge, you would fall into the water.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы вы перешли тот старый мост, вы бы упали в воду.
turkish_example_sentence: Eğer o eski köprüden geçseniz, suya düşseniz.
